pageTitle: Internal Audit, Risk Management, Governance: Survey and Analysis: PwC
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4666=With the risk landscape drastically expanded, are you getting the value you need from internal audit? Read PwC’s eye-opening 2013 survey of the profession to learn more., 2427=And yet, as PwC’s 2013 State of the Internal Audit Profession Study reveals, many internal audit functions are not keeping pace with these changes—which poses a major challenge for companies (and audit committees) seeking to determine their future strategies for, and investment in, internal audit. (see regional comparative data on where the participants saw the greatest risks to their business).}
